languages.text: "Ммм. Ты, кузина, исчерпала себя как забава, с которой потешно играть. Мне надо как-то развеивать скуку... и, похоже, я нашел для себя новый способ сделать это".
"Mmm. You, cousin, no longer hold any interest for me as a plaything. But I must dispel my boredom somehow... and I seem to have found a thrilling new way to do so."
languages.original_text: "Ммм. Ты, кузина, исчерпала себя как забава, с которой потешно играть. Мне надо как-то развеивать скуку... и, похоже, я нашел для себя новый способ сделать это".

traits.locale_text: "Mmm. You, cousin, no longer hold any interest for me as a plaything. But I must dispel my boredom somehow... and I seem to have found a thrilling new way to do so."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mmm. You, cousin, no longer hold any interest for me as a plaything. But I must dispel my boredom somehow... and I seem to have found a thrilling new way to do so."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “这么说吧，表妹，你已经让我玩腻了。不过，我总得找些事情来打发时间……现在，我好像找到了相当有意思的新消遣。”
languages.original_text: "Mmm. You, cousin, no longer hold any interest for me as a plaything. But I must dispel my boredom somehow... and I seem to have found a thrilling new way to do so."

traits.locale_text: “这么说吧，表妹，你已经让我玩腻了。不过，我总得找些事情来打发时间……现在，我好像找到了相当有意思的新消遣。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Mmmh... Ma chère cousine, je suis las de jouer avec vous. Comment vais-je bien pouvoir tromper mon ennui à présent... ? J'ai ma petite idée, et ça promet d'être intéressant. »
languages.original_text: "Mmm. You, cousin, no longer hold any interest for me as a plaything. But I must dispel my boredom somehow... and I seem to have found a thrilling new way to do so."

traits.locale_text: « Mmmh... Ma chère cousine, je suis las de jouer avec vous. Comment vais-je bien pouvoir tromper mon ennui à présent... ? J'ai ma petite idée, et ça promet d'être intéressant. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Mmm. Prima, ya no tienes ningún interés para mí como juguete, pero debo sobrellevar mi aburrimiento de algún modo... y parece que he encontrado una forma nueva y emocionante de hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "Mmm. You, cousin, no longer hold any interest for me as a plaything. But I must dispel my boredom somehow... and I seem to have found a thrilling new way to do so."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm. Prima, ya no tienes ningún interés para mí como juguete, pero debo sobrellevar mi aburrimiento de algún modo... y parece que he encontrado una forma nueva y emocionante de hacerlo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「うーん、もう俺はお前に対して遊び道具としての興味はない。しかし、どうにかして退屈を紛らわせなければならない…そのためのスリリングな新しい方法を見つけた気がするんだ」
languages.original_text: "Mmm. You, cousin, no longer hold any interest for me as a plaything. But I must dispel my boredom somehow... and I seem to have found a thrilling new way to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「うーん、もう俺はお前に対して遊び道具としての興味はない。しかし、どうにかして退屈を紛らわせなければならない…そのためのスリリングな新しい方法を見つけた気がするんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hmm. Ihr, Base, seid als Spielzeug nicht mehr interessant für mich. Doch ich muss mir irgendwie die Langeweile vertreiben ... und ich habe eine aufregende neue Möglichkeit gefunden, das zu tun."
languages.original_text: "Mmm. You, cousin, no longer hold any interest for me as a plaything. But I must dispel my boredom somehow... and I seem to have found a thrilling new way to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. Ihr, Base, seid als Spielzeug nicht mehr interessant für mich. Doch ich muss mir irgendwie die Langeweile vertreiben ... und ich habe eine aufregende neue Möglichkeit gefunden, das zu tun."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Mmm. You, cousin, no longer hold any interest for me as a plaything. But I must dispel my boredom somehow... and I seem to have found a thrilling new way to do so."

languages.text: "Hımm. Artık canım... Seninle oynamayı pek istemiyor soydaş. Yine de sıkıntımı geçirecek bir şeyler gerek. İşte tam da buna uygun bir heyecan bulmuş hâldeyim."
languages.original_text: "Mmm. You, cousin, no longer hold any interest for me as a plaything. But I must dispel my boredom somehow... and I seem to have found a thrilling new way to do so."
